Name: Creature Discomfort
About the game: This is an adventure game. You go places and talk to people. You defeat enemies. You collect items in your inventory and use them when needed. You solve puzzles. The puzzles are not very hard. Point and click the floor or ground to move your character around. It is 3D. You have a health bar. If you die you can go back to where you were with full health. Pushing escape quits and saves the game.
